techmeme.title: Coinbase's stock fell 31% in Q1 2025, its worst quarterly performance since FTX collapsed in 2022; nearly every major crypto-linked stock plunged alongside it (Matthew Griffin/Bloomberg)
Amazon resumes drone deliveries in Texas and Arizona, after halting them in January to roll out a software update to fix issues with the drone's altitude sensor (Annie Palmer/CNBC)
Builder.ai dropped H2 2024 revenue estimates by ~25% after some sales channels "did not come through" and says a full audit report is expected by summer 2025 (Bloomberg)
Microsoft expands Copilot+ PC features like Live Captions and Cocreator, previously exclusive to models with Snapdragon chips, to models with AMD or Intel chips (Sean Endicott/Windows Central)
At the Intel Vision conference, CEO Lip-Bu Tan says Intel plans to spin off non-core assets, create new products including custom semiconductors, and more (Ian King/Bloomberg)
